anya-e0703n4:19_0: Vajjīputtakabhikkhū ca, duve jātā ime khalu.
anya-e0703n4:25_0: Dhammaguttiyabhikkhū ca, jātā khalu ime duve.
anya-e0703n4:28_0: Jātā saṅkantikā bhikkhū, suttavādā tato pana.
anya-e0703n4:30_0: Theravādena saha te, honti dvādasi’mepi ca;
anya-e0703n4:31_0: Pubbe vuttachavādā ca, iti aṭṭhārasā khilā.
anya-e0703n4:47_0: Nava nandā tato āsuṁ, kameneva narādhipā;
anya-e0703n4:59_0: Bindusārasutā āsuṁ, sataṁ eko ca vissutā;
anya-e0703n4:62_0: Vemātike bhātaro so, hantvā ekūnakaṁ sataṁ;
anya-e0703n4:72_0: Yojane yojane āṇā, niccaṁ pavattitā ahu.
anya-e0703n4:75_0: Devā devo akā tehi, saṁvibhāgaṁ janassaca.
anya-e0703n4:99_0: Akaṁsu mūsikā tehi, bhattaṁ rājakule ahu.
anya-e0703n4:114_0: Bhojesi sopi teyeva, tīṇi vassāni bhojayi.
anya-e0703n4:126_0: Sumanassa kumārassa, putto so hi kumārako.
anya-e0703n4:131_0: Katvā puraṁ sakāyattaṁ, mate pitari bhātaraṁ;
anya-e0703n4:132_0: Ghātetvā jeṭṭhakaṁ rajjaṁ, aggahesi pure vare.
anya-e0703n4:140_0: Tadahe’va varaṁ puttaṁ, vijāyitvā sutassa sā;
anya-e0703n4:143_0: Disvā taṁ jeṭṭhacaṇḍālo, attano sāminiṁ viya;
anya-e0703n4:146_0: Taṁ mahāvaruṇo thero, tadā disvā kumārakaṁ;
anya-e0703n4:158_0: Pubbe kira tayo āsuṁ, bhātaro madhu vāṇijā;
anya-e0703n4:159_0: Eko madhuṁ vikkiṇāti, āharanti madhuṁ duve.
anya-e0703n4:165_0: Titthaṁ jalatthaṁ gacchanti, ekā ceṭī tamaddasa.
anya-e0703n4:168_0: Eso madhvāpaṇo bhante, tattha gacchā’ti abravi.
anya-e0703n4:170_0: Tattha pattassa buddhassa, vāṇijo so pasādavā;
anya-e0703n4:174_0: Disvā madhuṁ pasanno so, evaṁ paṇidahī tadā.
anya-e0703n4:177_0: Ākāse yojane āṇā, bhūmiyaṁ yojaneti ca.
anya-e0703n4:179_0: Bhātare āgate āha, edisassa madhuṁ adaṁ;
anya-e0703n4:180_0: Anumodatha tumhe taṁ, tumhākañca yato madhu.
anya-e0703n4:190_0: Āpaṇā desikaṁ yātu, devittaṁ tassa patthayi;
anya-e0703n4:196_0: Caṇḍālavādī caṇḍāla-gāme āsi yato tu so;
anya-e0703n4:197_0: Patthesi mokkhaṁ mokkhañca, satta vassova pāpuṇi.
anya-e0703n4:199_0: Niviṭṭhapemo tasmiṁ so, rājā’ti turito tato;
anya-e0703n4:200_0: Pakkosāpesi taṁ so tu, santavuttī upāgami.
anya-e0703n4:206_0: Ajjā’yaṁ sāmaṇero me, ghare hessati sāmiko.
anya-e0703n4:208_0: Ālambitvā karaṁ rañño, so pallaṅke samāruhi;
anya-e0703n4:211_0: Disvā tathā nisinnaṁ taṁ, asoko so mahīpati;
anya-e0703n4:218_0: Taṁ sutvā bhūmipālo so, pasanno jinasāsane.
anya-e0703n4:220_0: Aṭṭha te niccabhattāni, dammi tātā’ti āha taṁ;
anya-e0703n4:221_0: Upajjhāyassa me rāja, tāni dammīti āha so.
anya-e0703n4:223_0: Puna aṭṭhasu dinnesu, tāna’dā cariyassa so;
anya-e0703n4:229_0: Sahatthā tappito raññā, dhammaṁ desiya bhūpatiṁ;
anya-e0703n4:234_0: Tato rājā pasanno so, diguṇena dine dine;
anya-e0703n4:244_0: Gharaṁ netvāna bhojetvā, datvā sāmaṇakaṁ bahuṁ.
anya-e0703n4:259_0: Paccekaṁ satasahassaṁ, so dāpesi dine dine.
anya-e0703n4:268_0: Te piṭakānaṁ therānaṁ, saṭṭhiye’kaṁ dine dine.
anya-e0703n4:286_0: Rūpaṁ anantañāṇassa, dassehi mama bho iti.
anya-e0703n4:292_0: Taṁ disvā’ti pasādassa, vimhayassa ca pūrito.
anya-e0703n4:294_0: Etena nimmitaṁ rūpaṁ, īdisaṁ kīdisaṁ nukho;
anya-e0703n4:300_0: Evaṁ mahānubhāvo ca, saddho cāpi mahīpati;
anya-e0703n4:301_0: Thero ca moggaliputto, diṭṭhā pubbe vasīhi te.
anya-e0703n4:318_0: Upaddavo sāsanassa, na sambhossāma taṁ mayaṁ.
anya-e0703n4:326_0: Kāle tumhesu eko taṁ, pabbājetu kumārakaṁ;
anya-e0703n4:341_0: Vedesu gaṇṭhiṭhānāni, pucchi so tāni byākari.
anya-e0703n4:344_0: Sabbe dhammā osaranti, ekadhammo hi ko nu so.
anya-e0703n4:346_0: Iccāha nāmaṁ sandhāya, thero māṇavako tu so;
anya-e0703n4:349_0: Dehīti āha so āha, dema no vesadhārino;
anya-e0703n4:350_0: Guruṁ āpucchi mantatthaṁ, mātaraṁ pitaraṁ tathā.
anya-e0703n4:367_0: Sagaṇaṁ dāsakaṁ theraṁ, tattha disvā pasīdiya;
anya-e0703n4:368_0: Pabbajjaṁ yāci so āha, tavā’puccha guruṁ iti.
anya-e0703n4:398_0: Pāhesuṁ saṅghavacanaṁ, vuṭṭhāya sa tahiṁ agā.
anya-e0703n4:400_0: Kumāro pucchi kiṁ bhante, nālapitthāti āha so;
anya-e0703n4:401_0: Bhuñjimha bhuñjitabbanti, āha bhojetha no api.
anya-e0703n4:403_0: Āha amhādise jāhe, sakkā bhojayituṁ iti;
anya-e0703n4:412_0: Ñatvā tissa paṭisandhiṁ, tato pabhuti siggavo;
anya-e0703n4:413_0: Thero so sattavassāni, taṁ gharaṁ upasaṅkami.
anya-e0703n4:416_0: Alattha aṭṭhame vasse, gacchāti vacanaṁ tahiṁ.
anya-e0703n4:419_0: Kiñci laddhaṁ ghare noti, pucchi āmāti so’bravi.
anya-e0703n4:421_0: Gharaṁ gantvāna pucchitvā, dutiye divase tato;
anya-e0703n4:424_0: Therassa vacanaṁ sutvā, so pasannamano dvijo;
anya-e0703n4:428_0: Bhojāpesi dijo niccaṁ, nisīdāpiya taṁ ghare.
anya-e0703n4:437_0: Tasmā so tassa pallaṅko, vāsayitvā lagīyati.
anya-e0703n4:440_0: Tassa taṁ āsanaṁ tassa, paññapesi ghare jano.
anya-e0703n4:445_0: Thero māṇava kiṁ mantaṁ, jānāsīti tamabravi;
anya-e0703n4:446_0: Tameva pucchaṁ therassa, pacchā rocesi māṇavo.
anya-e0703n4:457_0: Yassa vā pana cittaṁ nirujjhisati na uppajjissati;
anya-e0703n4:460_0: Taṁ cittayamake pañhaṁ, pucchi thero visārado;
anya-e0703n4:461_0: Andhakāro viya ahu, tassa so tamavoca so.
anya-e0703n4:463_0: Bhikkhuko nāma mantoti, buddha mantoti so bravi;
anya-e0703n4:464_0: Dehīti vutte novesa-dhārino dammi taṁ iti.
anya-e0703n4:470_0: Sotāphattiphalaṁ patto, thero ñatvāna taṁ tathā.
anya-e0703n4:482_0: Ekāhaṁ uparājā so, adakkhi migavaṁ gato;
anya-e0703n4:488_0: Attano cintitaṁ rañño, ārocesi gharaṁ gato;
anya-e0703n4:489_0: Saññāpetuṁ tu sattāhaṁ, rajjaṁ tassa adāsi so.
anya-e0703n4:491_0: Anubhohi ime rajjaṁ, sattāhaṁ tvaṁ kumāraka;
anya-e0703n4:499_0: Sattāhā’haṁ marissaṁti, tvaṁ na kīḷi ime kathaṁ;
anya-e0703n4:502_0: Iccevaṁ bhākarā vutto, sāsanasmiṁ pasīdi so;
anya-e0703n4:508_0: Ayaṁ thero viyā’hampi, pabbajja jina sāsane;
anya-e0703n4:509_0: Viharissaṁ kadā raññe, iti cintayi paññavā.
anya-e0703n4:519_0: Taṁ iddhiṁ uparājā so, disvā’tīva pasīdiya;
anya-e0703n4:551_0: Janena paribhuttesu, ṭhānesu ca tahiṁ tahiṁ;
anya-e0703n4:560_0: Pure bheriṁ carāpesi, sattame divase ito;
anya-e0703n4:584_0: Tasmiṁ samāgame āsuṁ, asīti bhikkhukoṭi yo;
anya-e0703n4:588_0: Khiṇāsavā bhikkhuniyo, sahassaṁ āsu tāsu tu.
anya-e0703n4:597_0: Passi sabbe vihāre ca, nānāpūjā vibhūsite.
anya-e0703n4:599_0: Atīva tuṭṭho te disvā, saṅghaṁ pucchi nisīdiya;
anya-e0703n4:602_0: Thero so moggaliputto, rañño pañhaṁ viyākari;
anya-e0703n4:605_0: Taṁ sutvā vacanaṁ bhiyyo, tuṭṭho rājā apucchi taṁ;
anya-e0703n4:606_0: Buddhasāsana dāyādo, hoti kho mādiso iti.
anya-e0703n4:625_0: Pabbajissatha kiṁ tātā, pabbajjā mahatī matā;
anya-e0703n4:626_0: Pituno vacanaṁ sutvā, pitaraṁ te abhāsisuṁ.
anya-e0703n4:628_0: Ajjeva pabbajissāma, sace tvaṁ deva icchasi;
anya-e0703n4:638_0: Pabbajjā pesi samahaṁ, saṅgha mittañca dhītaraṁ.
anya-e0703n4:644_0: Pabbajjā sikkhādānañca, tassā ca tadahu ahu.
anya-e0703n4:661_0: Sā bhikkhunī candalekhā, mahindo bhikkhū sūriyo;
anya-e0703n4:662_0: Sambuddha sāsanākāsaṁ, te sadā sobhayuṁ tadā.
anya-e0703n4:676_0: Āha puṭṭho kaṇiṭṭhena, bhesajjaṁ pasataṁ ghaṭaṁ.
anya-e0703n4:681_0: Piṇḍāya ce caraṁ sappiṁ, labhase tvaṁ tamāhara;
anya-e0703n4:684_0: Piṇḍāya caratā tena, na laddhaṁ pasataṁ ghataṁ;
anya-e0703n4:706_0: Mā hotu bhikkhusaṅghassa, bhesajjaṁ dullabhaṁ iti.
anya-e0703n4:716_0: Tato pabhuti saṅghassa, lābho’tīva mahā ahu;
anya-e0703n4:717_0: Pacchā pasannā ca janā, yasmā lābhaṁ pavattayuṁ.
anya-e0703n4:736_0: Titthiyānaṁ bahucattā ca, dubbaccattā ca bhikkhavo;
anya-e0703n4:737_0: Tesaṁ kātuṁ na sakkhiṁsu, dhammena paṭisedhanaṁ.
anya-e0703n4:751_0: Uposathaṁ tittiyehi, na karoma mayaṁ iti;
anya-e0703n4:752_0: Avo ca bhikkhusaṅgho taṁ, amaccaṁ mūḷhamānasaṁ.
anya-e0703n4:757_0: Rājabhātā tissatthero, taṁ disvā kiriyaṁ lahuṁ;
anya-e0703n4:758_0: Gantvāna tassa āsanne, sāsanamhi nisidi so.
anya-e0703n4:760_0: Theraṁ disvā amacco so, gantvā rañño nivedayi;
anya-e0703n4:761_0: Sabbaṁ pavattiṁ taṁ sutvā, jātadāho mahīpati.
anya-e0703n4:764_0: Evaṁ katena kammena, kassa pāpaṁ siyā iti.
anya-e0703n4:766_0: Tesaṁ apaṇḍitā keci, pāpaṁ tuyhanti keci tu;
anya-e0703n4:769_0: Taṁ sutvā’ha mahārājā, samattho atthi bhikkhuna;
anya-e0703n4:781_0: Theraṁ ānetu me tehi, tathā vutte sanāgami.
anya-e0703n4:783_0: Taṁ sutvā puna aṭṭha’ttha, there’macce ca pesayi;
anya-e0703n4:786_0: Rājā pucchi kathaṁ thero, āgaccheyya nu kho iti;
anya-e0703n4:790_0: Iti vutte mahārāja, thero essati so iti.
anya-e0703n4:792_0: Punāpi thero’macce ca, rājā soḷasa soḷasa;
anya-e0703n4:793_0: Visuṁ sahassa purise, tathā vatvāna pesayi.
anya-e0703n4:796_0: Theraṁ gaṅgāya nāvāya, ānethā’ti ca abravi.
anya-e0703n4:810_0: Therassa pāde dhovitvā, makkhetvā ca nisīdiya.
anya-e0703n4:815_0: Kanti vutte mahīkampaṁ, āha taṁ puna rāhaso;
anya-e0703n4:818_0: Ko dukkaroti pucchitvā, eka desāya kampanaṁ;
anya-e0703n4:824_0: Ṭhapāpetvā tadaḍḍhehi, saha taṁ yojanaṁ mahiṁ;
anya-e0703n4:825_0: Cālesi iddhiyā tatra, nisinnassa ca dassayi.
anya-e0703n4:830_0: Paṭicca kammaṁ natthīti, kiliṭṭhaṁ cetanaṁ vinā;
anya-e0703n4:836_0: Tasmiṁyeva ca sattā he, duve yakkhe mahīpati;
anya-e0703n4:845_0: Kiṁvādī sugato bhante, iti pucchi mahīpati;
anya-e0703n4:851_0: Apucchi dhammike bhikkhū, kiṁvādī sugato iti;
anya-e0703n4:852_0: Vibhajjavādī tāhaṁsu, taṁ theraṁ pucchi bhūpati.
anya-e0703n4:864_0: Saṅghassa rakkhaṁ datvāna, nagaraṁ pāvisī subhaṁ;
anya-e0703n4:874_0: Yathā te dhamma saṁgītiṁ, tissattheropi taṁ tathā.
anya-e0703n4:877_0: Abhāsi tissatthero ca, tasmiṁ saṁgīti maṇḍale.
anya-e0703n4:880_0: Ayaṁ navahi māsehi, dhamma saṁgīti niṭṭhitā.
